enchantment.description: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest.
enchantment.markdownDescription: The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest.

calculation.description: Which number to compare - either the `sum` of levels of this enchantment on all of the player's equipment, or the `max` level of this enchantment on any of the player's equipment.
calculation.markdownDescription: Which number to compare - either the `sum` of levels of this enchantment on all of the player's equipment, or the `max` level of this enchantment on any of the player's equipment.

comparison.description: Determines how the level of the specified enchantment should be compared to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how the level of the specified enchantment should be compared to the specified value.

compare_to.description: The value at which the level of the specified enchantment will be compared to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: The value at which the level of the specified enchantment will be compared to.

type.description:
## Enchantment

---


[Entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_condition_types/enchantment)

Checks the level of an enchantment on the entity's equipment.

Type ID: `origins:enchantment`

---

### Examples

```json
"condition": {
    "type": "origins:enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:protection",
    "calculation": "sum",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 16
}
```

This condition will check whether the entity is wearing a full set of Protection IV armor (or better, which might be possible with mods).

x-intellij-html-description:
title: Enchantment (Entity Condition Type) date: 2021-04-04

Enchantment

Entity Condition Type

Checks the level of an enchantment on the entity's equipment.

Type ID: origins:enchantment

Fields

Field Type Default Description
enchantment Identifier The namespace and ID of the enchantment of interest.
calculation String "sum" Which number to compare - either the sum of levels of this enchantment on all of the player's equipment, or the max level of this enchantment on any of the player's equipment.
comparison Comparison Determines how the level of the specified enchantment should be compared to the specified value.
compare_to Integer The value at which the level of the specified enchantment will be compared to.

Examples

"condition": {
    "type": "origins:enchantment",
    "enchantment": "minecraft:protection",
    "calculation": "sum",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 16
}

This condition will check whether the entity is wearing a full set of Protection IV armor (or better, which might be possible with mods).
